metadata.title: E&S Pets Yorkie Mug, 15 oz
features: A perfect mug for any dog lover
15 oz. ceramic mug with large, easy to grip handle
description: Be Festive and make your mornings easier to face with this unique and fun coffee mug. Mug holds 15 ounces of your favorite beverage. This high resolution Christmas design of your dog is printed on the front with "HO HO HO" on the back and "Good Dog, Woof, Bow Wow" printed on the inner rim.
